events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
The case was assigned to an agent specializing in returns and refunds to assist the customer efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the item is unused and in the original packaging for the return process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is still new, with all tags attached, and I have not worn it at all.
Thank you for the information. You can send the jacket back to us within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions for returning the jacket.
The return label has been sent to your email, and once we receive the jacket, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have returned the jacket and if everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week, and I already received the refund. Thanks for your help throughout the process!
Closing the case as the refund was successfully completed and the customer confirmed their satisfaction with the resolution.
